channel.title: Looking For Developer!
channel.description:
Hello there people, I am looking for a Server/Client Developer to help me on my Razanscape.
1. I am the only Server Developer atm, and i just can't do it anymore alone i have gathered up quite a nice community of 30-40 daily players but i just can't advance anymore with the lack of time so i'm trying to find some helping hands. 2. I also have a website if you want to check it out go to www.razanscape.com 3.We will be spliting the money.
Are you interested in joining me on this project? please fill this out below:
Code: Name: Age: Years of Experience: Skype: Previous Work:
If you need anymore info, feel free to message me on here, or message me your skype, and we can discuss more.

item.title: Looking For Developer!
item.dc:creator: @vincentvodb vincentvodb
item.description:
@vincentvodb wrote:

[quote=“uncalled for, post:5, topic:555415”][quote author=vincentvodb link=topic=674613.msg4509159#msg4509159 date=1464720919]
Code:

  • Java
  • C#
  • PHP, JS, HTML, CSS( + less)
  • MySQL
  • SQL
    Name: Vincent V.
    Age: 23
    Years of Experience: 5
    Skype: vincentvodb
    Previous Work:
  • IT Student (Last year)
  • Had my own server few years ago, nothing special just a basic server when delta was the main base.
  • Head Developer, CelestialX
    [/quote]

MySQL is not a programming language. “MySQL” is a database management system, “SQL” is a structured query language.[/quote]

I don’t see me saying “mysql is a programming language” ?

Read full topic

item.title: Looking For Developer!
item.dc:creator: @my-swagger my-swagger
item.description:
@my-swagger wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:9, topic:555415”][quote author=my-swagger link=topic=674613.msg4509287#msg4509287 date=1465066489]

[quote author=Pure_ link=topic=674613.msg4509283#msg4509283 date=1465061822]

MySQL is not a programming language. “MySQL” is a database management system, “SQL” is a structured query language.

It’s a special-purpose programming language
[/quote]mysql is not a programming language

That was straight from Wikipedia actually.

en.wikipedia.org

SQL

SQL (/ˌɛs.kjuːˈɛl/ ( listen) S-Q-L, /ˈsiːkwəl/ "sequel"; Structured Query Language) is a domain-specific language used in programming and designed for managing data held in a relational database management system (RDBMS), or for stream processing in a relational data stream management system (RDSMS). In comparison to older read/write APIs like ISAM or VSAM, SQL offers two main advantages: first, it introduced the concept of accessing many records with one single command; and second Originally bas...


[/quote]mysql is not a programming language[/quote]
Haha I was just thinking of SQL for some reason even though I saw mysql, my bad

Read full topic
